description: List service sites with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can list all service sites. Non-admin users can list service sites for brokers they are members of.
validation_notes: Filter constraints: --name is an exact match; --broker accepts a comma-separated list of broker IDs.

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple). Example: 123 or 123,456.

flags.name: --name
flags.description: Filter by name (exact match). Example: "North Yard".
